text: Kirstenbosch is an important botanical garden nestled at the eastern foot of Table Mountain in Cape Town. The garden is one of 10 National Botanical Gardens covering five of South Africa's six different biomes and administered by the South African National Biodiversity Institute (SANBI). Prior to 1 September 2004, the institute was known as the National Botanical Institute. == Other websites == * Official website from SANBI * Kirstenbosch entry at Botanical Gardens Conservation International * Description and history of Kirstenbosch at the University of Wisconsin * Botanical Society of South Africa * Kirstenbosch Conservatory: Kay Bergh Bulb House Category:Cape Town Category:Botanical gardens
title: Kirstenbosch National Botanical Garden
